# 2019 in the Republic of the Congo

Events in the year 2019 in the Republic of the Congo.
Incumbents
* President: Denis Sassou Nguesso
Events
* October: 2019â€“2020 Congo River floods: Torrential rains causes floods along the Congo and Ubangi rivers causing the displacement of thousands of people.
Sports
